text_block_list.text:
...This uma ran her best time ever in her final workout...
From the photos, her hindquarters look to be in good shape.
text_block_list.name: Chrono Genesis
Chrono Genesis
text_block_list.text:
She has a history of winning at the racecourse where she is running,
and her leading style suits this race... ...It's no surprise that she is the favorite.

text_block_list.name: Chrono Genesis
text_block_list.text: But...! This uma has made a miraculous comeback from injury, and is aiming to win back-to-back championships following last year's...

text_block_list.name: Chrono Genesis
text_block_list.text: Above all, there are rumors that this may be the last run...!

text_block_list.name: Chrono Genesis
text_block_list.text: Date? Or romance...? No, if history had to choose...

text_block_list.name: Chrono Genesis
text_block_list.text: --Uh, ah, Trainer...! I was talking to myself a little loudly, wasn't I!? S-Sorry...!
